ygData.subject: Awakening

In the Renewal chamber, Belthassan slowly opened his eyes. The 
soothing light coming from the green lamp kept him drowzy. However, he 
was back. He turned his head on his left and saw Daemos still 
unconscious. He reached for his comm system.

Belthassan:
Tripredacus, report to me at once.

Melchana arrived a few nano-cycles after. She had ordered Tankor and 
Thrust to come as soon as they had finished a check of the security 
perimeter.

Melchana:
Welcome back, brother. How do you feel?

Belthassan:
It matters not. I am online, and that's the point. Where is Gesper?

Melchana:
He found something very interesting. Autobots.

Belthassan:
What? Here on Earth? And what action has he taken?

Melchana:
He went to find a diplomatic way to approach them. Waste of time, if 
you want my opinion... Oh yes, another thing. We received a 
transmission from a group called the Angelions. Jetstorm volunteered 
to be our representant to a conference they are holding.

Belthassan frowned:
I leave you the base just a few mega-cycles and you manage to 
jeopardize the mission... Let's just hope what will come will prove me 
wrong...

Melchana:
Oh just shut up. If we can have Autobot allies, this will allow us to 
have some kind of protection. We may be the Prophets of the Matrix, 
but its power cannot be passed if we die. Besides, they have powerful 
enemies, and this means challenge for me!

Belthassan:
You may be right. Prophecy, open a frequency with the Autobot base. 
Autobots, we are the Tripredacus. A member of our faction is en route 
to meet with you so we can know ourselves more deeply. Please reply.
